text.en: oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: To the dharmakāya Amitābha we pray!
text.en-trans: chöku nangwa tayé la solwa deb

text.en: To the saṃbhogakāya—the Great Compassionate One—we pray!
text.en-trans: longku tukjé chenpo la solwa deb

text.en: To the nirmāṇakāya Padmākara we pray!
text.en-trans: tulku pema jungné la solwa deb

text.en: Wondrous emanation, master of mine,
text.en-trans: dak gi lama ngotsar trulpé ku

text.en: In India, you were born, you studied and you contemplated;
text.en-trans: gyagar yul du kutrung tö sam dzé

text.en: To the heart of Tibet you came, to subjugate its arrogant demons,
text.en-trans: böyul ü su zhal jön drekpa tul

text.en: In Orgyen you dwell, accomplishing the benefit of beings:
text.en-trans: orgyen yul du kuzhuk dro dön dzé

text.en: With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: When we gaze on the wonder of your perfect form,
Your right hand forms the mudrā of the sword,
Your left in the mudrā of summoning.
Your mouth held open, with teeth bared, you gaze up into the sky.
text.en-trans: zhal dré chetsik gyen la zik

text.en: O Gyalwé Dungdzin, Protector of Beings:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: When hearing the priceless teachings of Dharma,
Your body shines with a dazzling radiance of light,
In your right hand, volumes of the tripiṭaka,
In your left, the texts of Kīlaya.
All these profound teachings have infused your mind,
text.en-trans: zabmö chö nam tuk su chü

text.en: O Paṇḍita of Yangleshö:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: When placing under oath the protectors who abide by their vows
In that supreme place of power, immaculate and enchanting,
text.en-trans: drimé né chok nyam ré ga

text.en: On the very border of India and Tibet,2
You grant your blessing, and as soon as you arrive
The mountain becomes fragrant, a sweet scent wafting through the air,
Even in winter lotus flowers bloom,
And there flows a spring called 'Nectar of Enlightenment'.
In this supreme and sacred place, inundated with bliss,
text.en-trans: deden dé yi né chok tu

text.en: O Kyéchok Tsul Zang, clad in Dharma robes,
Your right hand wielding a nine-spoked vajra,
text.en-trans: chak yé dorjé tsé gu nam

text.en: Your left holding a jewelled casket
Brimful of the elixir of rakta.
You bind under oath the ḍākinīs and guardians who keep their pledges,
And you attain the siddhi of beholding the yidam deity face to face:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: When you establish the teaching of the buddhas,
And practise in the Slate Mountain forest,
Your ‘kīla of approach’ soars into the wide open sky.
You catch it with the vajra mudrā, roll it
Between your hands and hurl it into the Sandalwood Forest,
text.en-trans: dril zhing tsenden nak su pang

text.en: Which bursts into flames, evaporating its lake.
text.en-trans: mebar truk shing tso yang kem

text.en: In an instant, you burn the land of the tīrthikas to ashes,
text.en-trans: sib kyi mutek sa gang sek

text.en: And crush their dark yakṣa lords into dust.
O peerless Dükyi Shéchen:
text.en-trans: dren gyi domé dü kyi shé

text.en: With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: When overpowering the rākṣasas,
You appear as a youth in nirmāṇakāya garb,
Your amazing, beautiful form, with its lovely hue,
Perfect teeth and golden hair, gorgeous
text.en-trans: tsem drik utra ser la dzé

text.en: Like a youth of sixteen years,
Wearing all the jewel ornaments.
Your right hand grips a kīla of bronze,
Subjugating māras and rākṣasas.
Your left hand holds a kīla of teak,
Granting protection to your devoted sons and daughters,
text.en-trans: möpé bu la sung kyob dzé

text.en: Around your neck you wear a kīla of iron—
text.en-trans: gul na chak kyi purpa nam

text.en: You and the yidam deity are inseparable,
O Dzam Ling Gyen Chok, manifestation of non-duality:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: When you choose to go to the 'Land of Phantoms',
text.en-trans: dré yi yul du gongpé tsé

text.en: The ground on which the blazing pyre is lit
Turns into a lake, the width of an arrow shot,
text.en-trans: da gyang gang gi tso nang du

text.en: Where, on a lotus blossom, you appear, cool and sparkling.
Within the lotus, you display your realization
And win the name of Pemajungné, ‘Lotus-born'.
You come in person as a completely realized buddha—
O wondrous nirmāṇakāya, such as you:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: When you shine as the sun over Tibet,
An awe-inspiring guide for any with devotion in their hearts,
You display whatever forms each being needs to be tamed.
text.en-trans: gang la gang dul kur ten né

text.en: High up on the Khala mountain pass in Tsang,
text.en-trans: tsang khala yi la tok tu

text.en: You place the genyen of the dralas under oath.
Down in the valley of Tsawarong,
It was the arrogant genyen of the gods,
Twenty-one of them, you make swear fealty.
In Mangyul, at the temple 'Cloud of Love',
You grant attainments to the four bhikṣus.3
O supreme Khyépar Pakpé Rigdzin:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: On Palmotang’s plain of glory
text.en-trans: palmo tang gi pal tang du

text.en: You give the twelve tenma goddesses their binding oath.
Up on the Khala pass of Central Tibet,
You bind the white snow goddess Gangkar Shamé under oath.
In the marshlands of Damshö before Mount Lhabüi Nying,
You swear Thangla Yarshu to a solemn vow.
High up, on the peak of Mount Hépori,
You place all the devas and rākṣasas under oath:
And out of all these great gods and demons,
Some offer up the very essence of their life force,
Some are turned into guardians of the teachings,
Others take the pledge to act as your servants.
O mighty Dzutrul Thuchen:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: When you plant the teachings of the sublime Dharma,
As if hoisting a victory banner,
Samyé is completed spontaneously, with no need to be built,
And the entire vision of the king is fulfilled.
Then, you bore the names of three supreme beings—
text.en-trans: kyechok sum gyi tsen yang sol

text.en: One was Padmākara, ‘Lotus-born’,
One was Padmasambhava,
And one was Tsokyé Dorjé, ‘the Lake-born Vajra’.
O Dorjé Drakpo Tsal, now we invoke you by your secret name:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: When you practise at Samyé Chimphu,
You ward off harmful circumstances, and grant attainments.
text.en-trans: kyen ngen dok ching ngödrub nang

text.en: You set the king and ministers on the path to liberation,
Destroying those teachings of the Bönpos that conjure evil spirits,
text.en-trans: dön zuk bön gyi tenpa nub

text.en: And showing the dharmakāya, precious and immaculate.
O Kalden Drendzé, you lead us fortunate ones to buddhahood:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: Then you leave, and for the land of Orgyen,
Where now you subjugate the rākṣasa demons;
Great wonder—surpassing any human being,
text.en-trans: mi lé lhak gyur yatsen ché

text.en: Great marvel—in your phenomenal enlightened actions,
Great might—with all your miraculous powers:
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: Endowed with wisdom body, speech and mind, you are our glorious guide;
text.en-trans: ku sung tukden drowa drenpé pal

text.en: You have freed yourself of obscurations, and so know the three realms with vivid clarity;
text.en-trans: dribpa kün pang kham sum saler khyen

text.en: You have attained the supreme siddhi, and so possess the supreme body of great bliss;
text.en-trans: ngödrub chok nyé dechen chok gi ku

text.en: All the obstacles to our enlightenment—eliminate them for good!
With your compassion, inspire us with your blessing!
With your love, guide us and others along the path!
text.en-trans: tsewé dak sok lam na drong

text.en: With your realization, grant us attainments!
With your power, dispel the obstacles facing us all!
Outer obstacles—dispel them externally,
text.en-trans: chi yi barché chi ru sol

text.en: Inner obstacles—dispel them internally,
text.en-trans: nang gi barché nang du sol

text.en: Secret obstacles—dispel them into space!
In devotion, I pay homage and take refuge in you!
oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: oṃ āh hūṃ vajra guru padma tötreng tsal vajra samaya jaḥ siddhi phala hūṃ āḥ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema tötreng tsal benza samaya dza siddhi pala hung a
